li.label: ash lover
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always loved ash storms. The feeling of ash slowly wearing down skin, burning the sinuses and filling unexpected holes. [PAWN_pronoun] gets unreasonably happy whenever [PAWN_pronoun] is outside in one.

li.label: ash breather
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has mastered the art of breathing during an ash storm, and no longer suffers buildup during one. Though this doesn't meant [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys being outside in them.
